A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Heroism\, spectacle\, humor\, and tragedy abound in the latest Star Wars movie.  Mark Hamill brings a new richness and subtlety to Luke Skywalker in a performance that eclipses the rest of the cast.  The nostalgia is kept in good balance with the fresh new elements\, but the newer story arcs and characters occasionally seem like background noise to the continuing story of Skywalker.  Only occasionally\,  though\, and while I feel that eliminating said occasions would have made for a leaner movie (a bit of a slog at two-and-a-half hours)\, the whole experience is still a truly great one\, and I can truly say that it ranks among the very best of the series.
